article_title: ISIS Frees Hundreds of Yazidi Captives
article_text: ISIS forces freed hundreds of Iraq's Yazidi minority, which they had held since last summer. The former captives were elderly, disabled or sick, and were delivered to Kurdish forces in Kirkuk.

article_summary:
ISIS forces freed hundreds of Iraq's Yazidi minority, which they had held since last summer.
The former captives were elderly, disabled or sick, and were delivered to Kurdish forces in Kirkuk.
